{"id":1002936593,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"18 hours, 50 minutes","timestamp":1690226007,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1002936593/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Two Sum IV - Input is a BST","memory":"N/A","code":"# Definition for a binary tree node.\n# class TreeNode:\n#     def __init__(self, val=0, left=None, right=None):\n#         self.val = val\n#         self.left = left\n#         self.right = right\nclass Solution:\n    def findTarget(self, root: Optional[TreeNode], k: int) -> bool:\n        def helper(node):\n            if not node:\n                return False\n            complement = k - node.val\n            if self.findBST(root, complement, node):\n                return True\n            return helper(node.left) or helper(node.right)\n\n\n        return helper(root)\n    \n\n\n\n    def findBST(self, root, target, node):\n        if not root:\n            return False\n        if target == root.val and node is not root:\n            return True\n\n       if target > root.val:\n           return self.findBST(root.right, target)\n\n        return self.findBST(root.left, target)\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"two-sum-iv-input-is-a-bst","has_notes":false}
